problem_data.title: Word Ladder
problem_data.description:
A transformation sequence from word beginWord to word endWord using a dictionary wordList is a sequence of words beginWord -> s_1 -> s_2 -> ... -> s_k such that:

Every adjacent pair of words differs by a single letter.
Every s_i for 1 <= i <= k is in wordList. Note that beginWord does not need to be in wordList.
s_k == endWord

Given two words, beginWord and endWord, and a dictionary wordList, return the number of words in the shortest transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord, or 0 if no such sequence exists.

examples.explanation: One shortest transformation sequence is "hit" -> "hot" -> "dot" -> "dog" -> "cog", which is 5 words long.
The endWord "cog" is not in wordList, therefore there is no valid transformation sequence.

experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('hit', 'cog', ['hot', 'dot', 'dog', 'lot', 'log', 'cog'])
  標準輸出: 5
  你的輸出: 5

[測試#2] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('hit', 'cog', ['hot', 'dot', 'dog', 'lot', 'log'])
  標準輸出: 0
  你的輸出: 0

[測試#3] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('hit', 'hit', ['hot', 'dot', 'dog', 'lot', 'log', 'hit'])
  標準輸出: 1
  你的輸出: 1

[測試#4] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('hit', 'hit', ['hot', 'dot', 'dog', 'lot', 'log'])
  標準輸出: 0
  你的輸出: 0

[測試#5] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: ladderLength('a', 'c', ['b', 'c'])
  標準輸出: 3
  你的輸出: 2

[測試#6] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('ab', 'cd', ['ac', 'ad', 'cd'])
  標準輸出: 3
  你的輸出: 3

[測試#7] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('Ab', 'Cd', ['Ac', 'Ad', 'Cd'])
  標準輸出: 0
  你的輸出: 0

[測試#8] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('hit', 'cog', ['hot', 'hot', 'dot', 'dog', 'lot', 'log', 'cog'])
  標準輸出: 5
  你的輸出: 5

[測試#9] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: ladderLength('hit', 'cog', [])
  標準輸出: 0
  你的輸出: 0

=== 測試完成 (8/9) ===
